en.title: [Mar 2025] Index of Wholesale & Retail Trade
en.description: Monthly wholesale and retail trade performance, including the performance of motor vehicle sales.
en.description_email: DOSM has just released the latest monthly wholesale and retail trade data, covering sales turnover and volume.

bm.title: [Mac 2025] Indeks Perdagangan Borong & Runcit
bm.description: Prestasi bulanan perdagangan borong dan runcit, termasukan prestasi jualan kenderaan bermotor.
bm.description_email: DOSM telah menerbitkan data perdagangan borong dan runcit bulanan terkini, merangkumi nilai dan volum penjualan.
